title: Venus conjunct Mars
summary: A convergence of attraction and initiative. Desire is easier to act on, and actions are more likely to reflect genuine preference. The opportunity is embodied momentum without overreach.

meaning.headline: Desire and movement are aligned.

frames.text: Venus-Mars conjunctions bring coherence between what you want and what you're willing to do about it.
This aspect supports direct engagement when intention and action are mutually reinforcing.
Creative and relational initiatives tend to feel more embodied and decisive.
Attraction is easier to express when there's clarity about appetite and boundaries.
This guarantees passion, romance, or success.

frictions: Moving too quickly because alignment feels good
opportunities: Acting on desire with clarity and consent

do: Act on what you want while staying attentive to response.
Check that momentum is mutual, not assumed.
Use embodied energy to initiate something meaningful.
Let enthusiasm inform action without rushing outcomes.
Stay present to feedback as you move forward.
avoid: Forcing alignment where it doesn't exist
Ignoring pacing because things feel good
Overcommitting in the heat of the moment

reusable_lines.text: When desire and action align, momentum becomes usable.
Move with what wants to move-while staying responsive.

forbidden_claims: Predicting sexual, romantic, or creative outcomes
allowed_framing: Agency-forward language: 'you can choose to act...'
Contextual framing: 'if desire and clarity are present...'

sources: Venus-Mars conjunction as desire/action alignment archetype
